name: Hypno
flavorText:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

previous.name: Drowzee
previous.flavorText:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

next.name: Krabby
next.flavorText:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.
